CONSTRUCTION:      THESE DUVETS ARE STITCHED WITH A BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION. SQUARE BOXES ARE SEPARATED BY A SERIES OF 1  INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS.   THESE WALLS PERMIT THE DUVET TO EXPAND SO THAT THE DOWN CAN REACH ITS MAXIMUM LOFT ALLOWING EVEN DISTRIBUTION WHILE STILL HOLDING THE DOWN SECURELY IN PLACE.  EACH BOX IS INDIVIDUALLY FILLED WITH THE EXACT AMOUNT OF DOWN REQUIRED AND FINISHED WITH DOUBLE STITCHING AND PIPED EDGING.     THE FILLING IS 100% SIBERIAN GOOSE DOWN. THE CASING IS A LOVELY 100% COTTON CAMBRIC.  WITH A 330 HIGH THREAD COUNT FOR SUPERIOR STRENGTH AND A SOFT DELICATE FINISH IT IS CUSTOM MADE FOR PURE DOWN   PLEASE KEEP IN MIND THAT THE HIGHER THE QUALITY OF THE DOWN THE LONGER IT WILL LAST AND THE MORE COMFORT IT WILL GIVE YOU. .        100 % SIBERIAN GOOSE DOWN   650 FILL POWER   1   INCH INTERNAL FABRIC WALLS   CASING JAQUARD 100% COTTON   BAFFLE BOX CONSTRUCTION   MACHINE WASHABLE   15 YEAR GUARANTEE   CERTIFIED BY OEKO-TEX 100   DOUBLE STITCHING AND PIPING   COMES WITH A LOVELY RE-USABLE BAG

THE IDEA IS TO PRODUCE COTTON WITHOUT DAMAGING THE ENVIRONMENT OR ANYBODY S HEALTH IN THE PROCESS. THE QUALITY OF COTTON IS BETTER SINCE IT S HANDPICKED AND THIS BASIC PROCESS ALLOWS ONLY THE BEST OF THE FIBRE TO BE SPUN WITH MINIMAL IMPURITIES. HOMESCAPES ORGANIC COTTON IS FARMED IN INDIA. HOMESCAPES HAS TAKEN A SPECIAL CARE OF USING MINIMUM MIDDLEMEN IN THE PROCESS OF COTTON PROCUREMENT SO THAT MAXIMUM SAVINGS CAN BE PASSED ON TO THE CONSUMERS DESPITE THE PREMIUM GIVEN TO THE ORGANIC FARMERS.
